channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Frankenstein — Forever Childish
item.description: Del Toro’s remake refuses to grow up.

item.title: Fetterman torches Democratic Party in new book: 'Elitist,' 'lost touch' with working class
item.description: In his new memoir, Sen. John Fetterman, D-Pa., blames the Democratic Party's disconnect from working-class voters and border policy missteps for Presi...

item.title: Suspended Ohio Doctor Posed As Ex-Wife To Get Abortion Drugs Then Allegedly Forced Them On Girlfriend

item.title: Trump Must Crush The Left’s Antifa-Led Terror Network Or It Will Crush His Movement
item.description: The American people look to Trump to eradicate this massive domestic threat, but those calls do not seem to be yielding any results.

item.title: Congress Should Stop Passing the Buck to the Bureaucracy
item.description: The longer Congress writes laws that read like mission statements, the more frustrated voters will be when the mission goes sideways.

item.title: Anthropic says new $50B investment in data centers will create about 800 permanent jobs and 2,400 construction jobs
item.description: The tech industry is moving forward investments to build energy-hungry AI infrastructure, despite bubble concerns.

item.title: Only one in 3 U.S. adults approve of the way Trump is managing the government, AP-NORC poll shows
item.description: The approval rating decline was driven in large part by Republicans and independents, the survey found.

item.title: When will I know if my flight is canceled? Here’s what to expect as delays ripple across U.S. airports
item.description: Things will return to normal, eventually, but in time for Thanksgiving travel? That's not a given at this point.

item.title: DHS says migrant enforcement surge has cut crime in Chicago
item.description: The Department of Homeland Security's surge to arrest and deport illegal immigrants in Chicago has led to a "historic" drop in major crimes over the p...

item.title: Donald Trump Has No Answers for the Younger Generation
item.description: An atmosphere of discontent and disintegration is forming around the Zoomer class.

item.title: Fetterman’s new book details explosive feud with Gov Josh Shapiro over parole board dispute

item.title: Epstein email says Trump ‘knew about the girls’ as White House calls its release a Democratic smear
item.description: Democrats released emails referencing Trump, including a 2011 Epstein note saying Trump spent hours at his home with a sex trafficking victim.

item.title: Ben Shapiro And Anyone Else Telling Young People To ‘Just Move’ Are Missing The Point
item.description: If we continue to fail to address fundamental economic problems, eventually it won't matter where you move to.

item.title: J.D. Vance, at MAHA summit, urges people to 'challenge orthodoxy' about living healthily

item.title: Importing Foreign Workers To Take Americans’ Jobs Is The Opposite Of America First
item.description: You cannot put America first by putting Americans last.

item.title: Trump’s backing of H-1B visa program exposes cracks within MAGA movement
item.description: President Donald Trump faced renewed criticism from his MAGA base after defending H-1B visas for foreign workers in a Fox News interview this week.

item.title: Boomers Didn’t Pass On the American Dream

item.title: JFK's grandson Jack Schlossberg running for Congress
item.description: Jack Schlossberg, the grandson of President John F. Kennedy, has announced his bid for a House seat from New York.

item.title: Trump Dismisses Economic Anxiety at His Own Peril
item.description: As Oscar Wilde might have said, to lose one presidency over economic angst may be regarded as a misfortune; to lose two looks like carelessness.
